channel.title: My Login Banner Dims

item.title: My Login Banner Dims
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So yeah when a person logs in my login banner just dims down in color. Would you guys be able to help me with that? This is my code i’m pretty sure that controlls my banner, what would I change/add, etc… sendMessage("Alert##Welcome to Rehab United!##NEW UPDATE!## New Prayer Potion!); outStream.createFrame(249); outStream.writeByteA(1); // 1 for members, zero for free outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId); for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (j == playerId) continue; if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) disconnected = true; }

Read full topic
